author: bencomic

panels.narration: * MadTom slaps Mr. m with his riding-glove

right.text: Sir, truly a jest has here been proffered, in that you call a Gladstone supporter a true Briton! Why, hand me that tea, thou vartlet

left.text: Surely you partake in a magnificent jest! It is Gladstone who is to be supported by all true Britons
i do say fishfood has departed

right.text: I am sure the company would be similarly obliged with thine own departure

title: GETTING THE BUM'S RUSH 3 - THE DUELING BARD AND MINSTREL
